name: SnowBoi
description:
This is my first ever game (I'm new to everything: art, music, programming etc), so expect bugs or overall clunk.

Play as a weak snowman who wants to reach the big purple igloo for some reason,  being a snowman is hard especially when your only weapon... is yourself, yes you will have to quite literally throw yourself at evil reindeers and cursed snowmen to ki- I mean, game end them. Oh and don't take too long, the sun will be your doom unless you sleep at an igloo(:

for this game I took some inspiration from the optional mechanic (risk vs reward) by making your health bar not just a measurement of your health but also your ammo

I also used the optional palette 

bugs: audio sounds different (low quality, don't know how to fix),  I recommend you lower your volume

things I might add or was gonna add in the future: boss once you reach the inside of the cursed igloo, more juice/ feedback, possibly animations, reward for killing enemies(increased time on timer), improved death system and better music

FEEDBACK APRECIATED
